insights.populationGrowth: Slow 0.8% with subsistence agriculture and limited development.
insights.educationLevel: Lower 63% literacy due to ethnic diversity and remote location.
insights.employmentPattern: Subsistence agriculture 68%, forestry 15%, government 10%, small trade 5%, services 2%.

insights.precipitation: High 2,200mm with intense monsoon flooding in valleys.
insights.extremeEvents: Flash floods in valleys, landslides, isolation during monsoon.

recentDisasters.impact: Multiple villages cut off, subsistence crops destroyed

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Very Low - Remote mountain location, minimal infrastructure

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: Subsistence economy with ethnic diversity, limited market access, high poverty
